pages.title: Redtooth Triggerfish
pages.text: The redtoothed triggerfish ($(o)Odonus niger$()) is a triggerfish of the tropical Indo-Pacific area, and the sole member of its genus.$(br2)Some other common names include blue triggerfish, redfang triggerfish, redtoothed filefish, and Niger triggerfish.

pages.title: Redtooth Triggerfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
